entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
